fields.label: HTML Block
fields.content: Please enter your first name and last name exactly as shown on your birth certificate or passport. As a care company, we need this to be correct for legal and compliance reasons.

fields.label: Are you known by another first name?
fields.description: For example, Bob instead of Robert, Liz instead of Elizabeth

fields.label: Do you have a full UK Driving Licence?

fields.content: The Individuals We Support have busy, active lives and so driving the company and individuals' vehicles is a really important task expected of all our support workers.

fields.label: Do you have any points or endorsements on your licence?
Please provide full details (points, dates, etc.)
Right to Work Details
fields.content: As an employer, we have to check that all applicants have the Right to Work in the UK. For more details of these checks and why we have to do them, please click here

fields.label: Do you have the right to work in the UK?
Right To Work - No
fields.content: Unfortunately you are not eligible to apply for a vacancy at Home From Home Care.

fields.label: Do you require a VISA to work in the UK?

fields.label: Location the position is based at
How did you hear about the vacancy?
Are you applying for part-time hours?
Please specify your availability
fields.description:
Please specify how many hours per week you will be available to work.
Please note, that due to rota commitments it may not always be possible to meet your requirements.

fields.label: Education
fields.description: Please list your education which is relevant to the role you are applying for (e.g. health and social care, mental health)

fields.label: Training
fields.description: If you have previously worked in a care environment, please state any training that you have attended and in-house qualifications. Please specify the name of the company which you obtained the qualification with.

fields.label: Do you have any additional learning requirements?
How do you rate your computer skills?
Have you currently got, or have you previously suffered with, any injuries that will make you unable to carry out heavy lifting or any physical training?
References
fields.content:
We need to obtain 3 satisfactory references before you can begin to work for us. This is due to the nature of the organisation, caring for the individuals we support and the high expectations we have of all our staff.

PLEASE NOTE: For Current / Most Recent Employer and Previous Employer references - relatives or friends will not be accepted.

Current / Most Recent Employer and Previous Employer references must be different employers; we are unable to take a reference from the same company twice. Your character reference can be someone of your choice, however they cannot be a family member or partner.

If you have ever worked in a care environment or with vulnerable people (children, adults or the elderly) you MUST list them as a reference. We must contact them due to the nature of the role you are applying for.

fields.label: If this is your first job after full-time education, please tick the below box to switch to providing an Education Reference

fields.label: Your Character Reference
fields.description: Your character reference can be someone of your choice, providing that they are not a family member or partner.

fields.label: How do you know this person?
Has a safeguarding allegation ever been made against you?
Have you ever been referred to the Independent Safeguarding Authority Barred List
Have you ever had any complaints made against you whilst working in a care environment?
Criminal Convictions
fields.description:
The position that you are applying for is exempt from the provisions of the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act under the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act (Exceptions Order) 1975. All previous convictions must therefore be declared. No convictions can be considered “spent”, too minor or too old to be included.

As you will be working with vulnerable adults, prior to commencing in the post you will be required to undergo a Disclosure and Barring Scheme (DBS) police check, unless you subscribe to the DBS Update Service (see below).

fields.label: Have you ever been convicted of a criminal offence, cautioned, or served a sentence or a suspended sentence?
Please provide details of all convictions, cautions, reprimands or police warnings with dates - spent or otherwise.
Do you subscribe to the DBS Update Scheme?
Data Protection
fields.description: Home From Home Care Ltd. undertakes to treat personal details on this application form from which you can be identified with complete confidentiality. By submitting this application form you are consenting to your details being used in our recruitment process, they will also be used to contact you to arrange an interview in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
